name: Progress
description: A progress indicator component from Fluent UI that shows the completion progress of a task or operation.

props.name: value
props.description: Current progress value (0-1 for determinate, undefined for indeterminate)

props.name: max
props.description: Maximum value for the progress bar

props.name: shape
props.description: Shape of the progress bar ends

props.name: validationState
props.description: Validation state affecting the progress bar color
